pullRequest.body:
Previously these were syntactically identical to the corresponding `zpow_coe_nat` and `coe_nat_zsmul` lemmas, now they are about `OfNat.ofNat`.

Unfortunately, almost every call site uses the `ofNat` name to refer to `Nat.cast`, so the downstream proofs had to be adjusted too.

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

nodes.body:
Thanks for spotting this!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8068628994/job/22041858889)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8068628994/job/22041859146)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8068628994/job/22041858602)

While you're at it modifying almost all calls to those lemmas, could you change them to the proper name?
```suggestion
@[to_additive (attr := simp, norm_cast) natCast_zsmul]
theorem zpow_natCast (a : G) : ∀ n : ℕ, a ^ (n : ℤ) = a ^ n
```
`coe_nat` was referring to the handmade `ℕ → ℤ` coercion we had in Lean 3. This coercion didn't make it to Lean 4 (we only have the `OfNat` and `NatCast` ones), so we should start dropping it from lemma names.

Given I've already done the modification, I don't think the present tender of "are modifying" is a particularly compelling argument any more. I'd prefer to do your suggested change as a separate PR, especially since there are `coe_nat` lemmas in other files too that also need renaming.
I'm counting in terms of "size of the diff to master", but sure

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - fix: correct statement of `zpow_ofNat` and `ofNat_zsmul`
